reviews.review:
It's a great game. I played and finished the game already on my XBox but bought it again on Steam along with Bioshock 1 and 2 for a great deal. This time I plan to go for the achievements, and enjoying the scenary more. 
Otherwise it's defintely one of my favorite games because of the atmosphere, scenary, story, action, and exploration. What's not to love, right?!? 
11/10
Great game. Many hours played. Should have multiplayer
It's pretty good
Bioshock Infinite has one of the most compelling and immersive stories I have ever witnessed.

Didn´t play any of the Bioshock games before this. Didn´t know what to expect.. I was surprised though.

Linear action but with great story telling and a perfect "wtf?!"-ending. In my opinion the best game in 2013, DLCs are also worth their money. 

10/10
This game is infinitely better than Bioshock 2 (pun intended). Be prepared though for a deviation from the first two games. Overall, the story is good and the fighting is extremely fun.
Con un aspecto desenfadado y una pretensión compleja, su historia es única en su género y solo se ve superada por el BioShock original.

Simplesmente a melhor história em FPS que eu já VIVENCIEI. Recomendo a qualquer gamer. Você ficará tenso o jogo inteiro, sem ar em algumas partes, mas o mais importante de tudo: ficará emocionado no final. É fantástico.

Un jeu étonnant, dont la direction artistique est magnifique. Désormais à moitié prix il est plus que recommandable, les combats ont la pêche, certaines parties sont un peu répétitives, mais le personnage principal (Elizabeth) vous entrainera jusqu'au bout de l'aventure car on veut à tout prix l'aider, la sauver et savoir...

Une grande réussite !

Visitez et abonnez vous au curateur et au groupe "Vive les jeux vidéos Pc", vous y trouverez d'autres avis et recommandations en français ! Merci !
Great Story, Good Gameplay, Great Graphics, Recommended

Polecam grę wszystkim fanom serii BioShock jak i tym którzy nie mieli okazje grać w ten tytuł. Mało jest gier które mogą zachwycić fabułą jak i wysokim poziomem grywalności. Jeżeli chodzi o oryginalność pomysłu przeniesienia rozgrywki z podwodnego miasta do podniebnego, może wydać się pójściem na łatwiznę. Jednak pierwsze kroki w Kolumbii zapierają dech w piersi i wiele razy zdarzyło mi się zatrzymać i podziwiać pełne życia miasto. Oczywiście nie można pominąć postaci Elizabeth z którą naprawdę się zżyłem i nie raz mi pomogła i zaskoczyła w czasie rozgrywki. To gra która szokuje zakończeniem i ma się chęć odpalić od nowa. Gdzie na początku myślałem że to nieistotne sceny, to jednak wszystko miało jakiś sens. Gra się z przyjemnością, można doczepić się jak wszędzie jakiś rzeczy, detali jak np. brak możliwości samodzielnego zapisywania gry co bardzo osobiście nie lubie. BioShock Infinite to tytuł na wysokim poziomie i polecam każdemu maniakowi gier komputerowych.
10/10 I played the living shit out of this game, if you like steam punk at all you MUST buy thius game and if you liked the other bio shocks its different but it a good way
Felt nothing like its predecessors, which I loved.
Its like the first one but better then the  second one and better then cheese thats saying alot..
One of the best single player games i have ever played! Highly recommend! 9/10 in my opinion

90/100: On highest difficulties combat tends to become very repetitive as there are clear optimal approaches to success, and at this level optimal means feasible. Beyond that, good story, but above all fantastic artwork, atmosphere and level design.

Interesting enemies, diabolical and believable bosses, fun in game attack movement , excellent powers and abilities, emotionally engaging story and a ending that ties it all together quite nicely.

Well done Bioshock infinite, well done.
too much foolish illumination

Стоит ли покупать и проходить эту игру с довольно посредственным гемплеем? Определённо да, потомучто сюжет Байошок Инфинити вывернет Вас на изнанку и взорвёт ваш мозг. Однозначно подобный сюжет достоен оскара, пройдя который игрок испытает всю гамму чувств. Ну и конечно же виды безграничной красоты тоже заслуживают отдельного внимания, это  и солнечный свет, льющийся сквозь цветные витражи храмов это и закат/рассвет, вид Парижа поутру и вид отрываемых конечностей, ой, простите, вырвалось)))  по пройдению инфинити, я понял что хочу пройти 2ю часть (первая часть, кстати особенно обязательна для прохождения перед тем как включать инфинити, дабы получить правильное впечатление от сюжета), так как возможно найду там какие-то ответы на вопросы, которых по сюжету игры не у меня одного собралась туева хуча. Забравшись в интернет я нашёл чуть ли не целые диссертации людей, которые решили разобраться во всей этой кутерьме, задуманной Левином, не ожидал что видеоигра может заставить людей так углубиться в психологию, а некоторых и самокопанием заняться... не советую делать этого до тех пор, пока не пройдёте игру сами, так как есть вероятность напороться на множество спойлеров.

A game that'll make you so confused, that you'll love every second of it.

9/10

One year ago i bought this game on sale, and i was just leaving there for no interest and for some doubts about the dev, "if it was possible to do something better than Bioshock 1 - 2". 

It was possible, maybe was not easy but was possible.

Well now i know that perfection in games is possible, i'm 38 i play since 1984, and i can say is in my personal top 5 of videogames

Gameplay maybe lack sometimes, but the full game is an anthem to perfection.

There are games like Valkyria Chronicles, Mass Effect, Prince of Persia, Zelda, Mario, Metal Gear, Half Life, or The Witcher and others that are legends, is very hard to reach the "Legend level", you must give something more than "another good game", something that player will never forget, something that after 4 hours of play your girlfriend call you and ask you to meet her and than you say, "sorry but no way, unless you are dying consider me dead for the next 2 days", and something that force you to take a breath after the game "couse"  15 hours on no stops is a quite hard.

Graphic  10 / 10
Combat sys (including jump and environment interaction)  9 / 10
Gameplay 8,5 / 10
Voice Acting  10 / 10
Detail's care  10 / 10
Story "DLC INCLUDED"  50  / 10  and no is not a mistake

Sinceramente,  é o melhor jogo que eu joguei na vida até agora, o melhor em todos os sentidos, Trilha sonora, gráfico, jogabilidade, história e que história !@#$, surpreendente, chocante. Ela te envolve nela, uma história que faz refletir, cada progresso feito no jogo, mais vontade da de jogar. Fiquei sem palavras com o fim dele, Vale cada centavo dos 89,99 reais. Pretendo ainda comprar as DLC'S, recomendo a todos jogar, pois é daqueles jogos que você é obrigado a jogar antes de morrer!!

História 10/10
Gráfico 10/10
Trilha Sonora 10/10
outstanding story, graphics, and character development.

Игры мне нравятся за сюжет, за развитие персонажа, за взаимоотношения героев в игре, за эмоции, что она дарит, вызывает, за интерес, который игра постоянно потпитывает, развитием сюжета. В этой игре сюжет  отсутствует. Точнее он вроде бы есть, но он настолько поверхностный, что игра не вызывает у меня ни каких эмоций, ни какого интереса. В неё не хочется играть. Но вот честно не понимаю, за что все так хвалят данную игру. Биошок 2 был, лично для меня, гораздо лучше этого. 
Даже если рассматривать её только как шутер, она всё-равно не интересна. Механика боёв удручает. Вот в Макс Пейн я играл с удовольствием. От Far Cry 3 вообще не мог оторваться, так меня увлекла. А эта игра мне не принесла ни какого удовольствия от прохождения. Более того, оставила меня неудовлетворённым от игры. Такие игры мне абсолютно не нравятся. 
Помимо сюжета, в игре не понравилась картинка, графика, какая-то мультяшная она.

I am not a FPS person, but the Bioshock series is the only FPS series that I like to play.
Infinite is different than the previous games when you look at the atmosphere. It is still in an Art Deco setting, but it seems to be a lot brighter at first sight. But it gets darker when you get more into the storyline.

I liked the graphics and artstyle a lot. I love the city of Columbia. And you can fly around on a rails through the city, how cool is that?
The story is very interesting as well. It is quite complicated, but when you progress you can understand it a lot better. I also think that Elizabeth is a good sidekick, she was quite helpful to me (as a FPS noob hehe). The vigours are a good addition as well, in my opinion.

And the DLC are good to play as well. They are not superlong, but give you a better insight of the story.

Would I recommend this game? Yes, definitely! 

My rating for this game: 9/10.
Jedna z nejlepšíh her, naprosto doporučuju, zážitek. Mnoho originálních nápadů. Nenudil jsem se ani vteřinu!!!

Эта история тронет вас до глубины души. Каждый из тех, кто её пройдёт останется при своём мнении. Особом мнении, и осадком в стиле "Я прошёл ШЕДЕВР!!!" Графика изумительна! Чего стоит только начальная сцена... Геймплей в меру сложный. Противники никогда не дадут вам заскучать! Тут-же есть всеми любимые плазмиды, и аэро-трассы, которые открывают новые тактические возможности. А так же она порадует любителей обшаривать каждый уголок, ибо искать есть что. Чего конечно ей не хватает, так это большего разнообразия оружия и врагов. Это сложная и запутанная история... Но она стоит того.
Just... Play it. I can't explain why. Just play this. Please. You will never regret it

Нет в интернете игры с таким же количеством обсуждения концовки (как основной игры так и второго дополнения). Есть в этих диспутах умные мысли и наблюдения, есть пространный поток мыслей псевдоителлектуалов и девочек с психологическим образованием, умилительно пытающихся пользоваться медицинской и научной терминологией). В любом случае резонанс не без основателен. Сюжет увлекает и затягивает, бои отвлекают и раздражают). Получился совсем не идеальный, но гениальный проект, заслуженно признанный шедевром искусства и игроиндустрии.

Pour moi qui commence la série par cet opus, je suis content de ce jeu.

Les décors sont très beaux, les combats dynamiques et tendus (difficulté : difficile), une bonne quantité d'armes et de pouvoirs différents.

Par contre il n'y a pas de place pour l'infiltration dans ce jeu (à part pour le dernier DLC) ce qui aurait pu servir dans pas mal de situations.

L'histoire est très interessante même si la fin est un peu WTF.

Foda!!! Jogo extremamente bem feito, otimizado, gráficos bons e ótima jogabilidade.

Porém o melhor é a história, absurdamente bem feita! precisei penar para entender tudo.

200% Recomendado
One of my favorite games of all time, a great successor to Bioshock 1 and 2.
Its like bioshock 2, but without the metal undies
Splatter your way through an enjoyable, if gory, plot line on rails... literally.
I liked the way the game flowed and how it all went. the game was a mind bender, but ultimately good anyway.
Simplesmente FANTÁSTICO!

Excellent game. Really delivered on all the promise it held. Sometimes you have to be wary of these mega-marketed games and all. Love every moment of this game, even arguing with friends about what exactly happened in it!

This game is down right awesome.
Just one of my best game

Как и в оригинальном Bioshock (1) во время игры, при осмотре локаций, по ходу развития сюжета и боёв с оппонентами возникают смешанные чувства. Удивляешься чудной атмосфере воздушного города (подводного ли) и гадливо сжимаешься от того, что в этих волшебных чертогах творят его обитатели. Хочется опустить оружие и хватать за руки, за плечи каждого врага, встраяхивать его, просить перестать убивать и разрушать - ведь всё могло бы и получиться, не такая уж и утопия...
Amazing game.

A true masterpiece in gaming. One of the few games that I have seen that really sets the bar for artistic expression and production value. I don't know why I waited so long to experience it! What are you waiting for... PLAY THIS NOW!

Ужасно хочется еще новых и интересных локаций ТТоТТ
Может, кто нибудь  додумается до мультиплеера и в инфините :D
Loot... Loot.... And MORE LOOOT!!!

Esse jogo é um prato cheio pra quem curte enredo meio filosófico, no começo a história pode parecer meio comfusa, mas é tipo um nó que vai desatando com o tempo e o final, o final é muito bem feito! recomendo esse jogaço, muito bom mesmo!   a história é tão bem feita que um modo multiplayer nem chega a fazer falta, esse é aquele tipo de jogo que não merece ser zerado apenas uma vez.

PROS:
- One of the best sci-fi story
- Exceptional narrative
- One of the most beatiful setting. Columbia literally left you ligobsmacked!
- Very interesting cooperative IA
- Extremely engaging
- The chracters are very well chacterized as well as the context and its history
- Very good and varied gameplay, it definidetly improves the Bioshock's gampley addying better shooting phase and very interisting additional elements as the Elizabeth's power and the railroads
- Very fun gameplay, especially in big battles


CONS:
- Few problems of gameplay in certain situations
- Some shooting situation are bad-designed



SCORE:    9.5
Dull and repetitive. And the graphics aren't even that wonderful. Not sure why this game got such rave reviews.

great stroy, great graphics, great idea... a must buy for people with a decent PC, and a reason to get a decent pc for those who dont have one!

The beginning of this game is quite slow. The combat is quite good but not mind blowing. The mechanics are quite balanced but you will be playing for the excellent story line. The Bioshock writers have raised the bar in story writing.
fun and exiting with the ending amazing

Pro - Decent story-based FPS with a beautiful, immersive environment.
Con - Uninspired and generic, like most triple-A games.
one of the most heart warming/breaking stories ive ever played in video games.
Das beste Teil der Trilogie :)
Good story line with non-stop action.  Loved the futuristic steam-punk feel.

Rather than a yes/no recommendation, i'd give this game a "meh". The graphics are very pretty, and the story is pretty interesting at times, although the ending is kind of a letdown. The gameplay is decent, but doesn't break any new ground from the previous Bioshock games. What I found completely lacking was replayability. If you are fine with playing through the a ~11-12 hour game, then never picking it up again, then maybe you won't mind so much, but for something I paid $50 for, I felt slightly cheated. Maybe if you can get it on a sale at $10 or under, but at full price, there's just not enough enjoyment there.
Cool game, short story

11/10! 
Поставить оценку ниже не позволяет совесть!

На протяжении всего того времени, которое я провел за прохождением этой замечательной игры, я старался делать так, как ведет меня судьба Букера. Я никогда не забуду то место, откуда события брали свое начало,на тот момент пока еще слабо мне понятные. Да, я имел в виду именно тот самый начальный эпизод, когда Букера везли к маяку в целях выполнения поставленной задачи. Ни за что не забуду Колумбию - чудо среди человеческих изобретений, полную счастливых людей, которая так тепло и радушно встретила меня "ножом в животе". 
Отдельное спасибо разработчикам за то, что в игре есть незаменимый помощник. Ох, милая, добрая Элизабет.
Трудно забыть ту правду, которую Букер пытался забыть много лет назад. Все те события, которые я переживал раз за разом, оказались весьма плачевными. Только представьте мое разочарование к концу игры в тот самый переломный момент, когда все точки были расставлены над "i". Я никогда не рыдал так сильно, как это было к концу данной игры.
Этот выдуманный мир подарил мне частичку себя, сохранил меня в нем тем, кем я являюсь,
тем, кем я стал благодаря ему.
"Ты хочешь начать всё заново... но прежде время обернется вспять, чем ты найдёшь прощение. Не все грехи можно искупить." 10/10.

Это шедевр нетолько в плане сюжета,но и в плане гемплея.В это игре есть все отличный сюжет , крутой геймплей , неплохая графика и АТМОСФЕРА!!!This is a masterpiece, not only in terms of plot,but in terms gamplay this game has everything a great story , cool gameplay , good graphics and ATMOSPHERE!!!
kann ich nur empfehlen

If you have not played this game, you are missing out.  The combat is fast and fun, the exploartion is rewarding, the visuals are awe inspiring, and the story.........will make you rethink just how powerful games can be for delivering a thought provoking peice of art.   It is critally acclaimed and earned it.

When i first played this game i thought it was the weakest of the 3 Bioshocks.  After several playthroughs, and a complete understanding of ALL the gameplay mechanics, i discovered that, despite the more simplistic style of gameplay, i found it to be more enjoyable than the first 2.  Don't get me wrong, Bioshock 1 is an absolute classic in every regard.  Infinite has something going for it though:  Vigors.  I found myself using all the vigors in a single playthrough at some point.  I cant say the same for Bioshock 1 or 2....the vigors were just that much fun to use.  

The story took a playthrough or 2 to fully understand because i missed a couple minor details in the first run.  It's confusing at first glance, but holds an amazing, and tearjerk-worthy payoff.  The payoff feels bigger as a parent, without spoiling any plot.

9/10
Wonderful gameplay, great story, nostlagic DLC, and my favorite AI partner of all time. The game is great, nuff said.
I love this game so far.

A fantastic game indeed! The story is wonderful, though the ending can be rather confusing. The art style is beautiful, and the combat system is great. I have played a bit of BioShock, and it seems like they don't really have much to do with each other (BioShock and BioShock Infinite), even for being in the same series.

Rating - 9/10
One of the best games I've ever played. The story was so good you don't even care about the flaws in combat. 10/10

Simply an awesome game! I think it's a little too short, but the story is amazing and the gameplay is great. Really had fun playing this and the ending, omg it was good! If you haven't played this then you're missing out on some great characters, great story and great gameplay.
the ending is AMAZING

This game was actually a very pleasant surprise, particularly since i got it on sale just to try it out, and im glad to say it was well worth it.

The game is a decent FPS with great graphics and smooth gameplay, characters are very well written, there is a reason to care what happens to them, the game provides a satisfying challenge on ultimate difficulty, there are no severe or gamebreaking bugs, havent experienced a single crash after 70+ hours of gameplay, the challenges and achievements all unlock properly and accordingly. However there are 2 aspects of the game which imo make it an above average shooter- the story and the game companion.

The story is a deep, memorable, open for interpretation type, borderline philosophical, which sticks with you for some time even after you close the game. It did however take me 2 playthroughs to completely understand it, but i value the effort put into the story and how throughout the game they slowly reveal details to you, just to give you a totally unexpected finale.

As for the follower/game companion, this game offers the most likable and usefull companion ive ever seen in a singleplayer game. I personally dont like followers because in most games they just block me in corridors, alert enemies to my presence, set off traps or make stupid remarks. Luckily Liz doesnt do any of these things and she also throws you ammo/health during combat when youre low, which makes you want to keep her around. 

The game comes with 2 DLCs- Clash in the Clouds (combat challenge based) and Burial at Sea. While ive enjoyed the main game and CitC DLC very much for above stated reasons, the events that take place in Burial at Sea DLC were at least from my point of view very confusing and anticlimatic. Probably because i havent played BioShock 1 or 2 prior to this game, and their stories are bound.

CONCLUSION
Not to bother with numeric evaluation, lets just say i find this game to be exceptional. If you can, try this game out, absolutely recommended!
Если вы предпочитаете игры с сюжетом,то этот шедевр для вас.
Even less immersive sim elements compared to Bioshock 1/2 but as a shooter with nice environments it's pretty good.

Game is Really Damn Hard on 1999 Mode but still fun When you are running from your life from handymen and bosses.
and This is one of the only games with a useful Partner!

8.5/10 Tight fit but would do again

Beautiful game in terms of looks, as for substance the game was a bit hallow and lacking. The story was interesting as most BioShocks are. I think the only thing that really kept me going through this game was collecting all the old american silver coins. However, silver eagels as the game calls them were not produced until 1986 and that inaccuracy bothered me heavily.
Fantastically written, Bioshock Infinite dosn't require the completion of the previous games for context. Very well opitmised for such a detailed game. Great story and character development. 9.5/10

this a game that i love because it takes the original bioshock story and moves pieces around and makes a beautiful game which has emotional build up as you get attached to booker and elizabeth, and also in the dlc with the remainder of her saga.

Hands down the best game I have ever played. This game reminded me why I play games, and I cannot recommend this more. Beautiful graphics and extremely in-depth storyline, both the high flying Columbia and the deep down Rapture (from the burial at sea dlc's), create a very real, very compelling environment.

Recomendadisimo, lo digo como fanboy de la saga. Es el mejor juego que tube el lujo de disfrutar en mi vida, sin palabras. Lo acabo de terminar y nada, tengo ese vacio existencial que te da siempre que terminas este tipo de juegos, donde cada personaje cuenta tiene su historia y hacen que te metas en su piel, sufras, llores, rias con ellos. La verdad 11/10 puntos. Una Obra De Arte!

Le gameplay est facile à prendre en main.
Graphiquement c'est beau, c'est vaste.
Les décors sont soignés, les expressions des visages et les dialogues sont au tops.
Le scénario est béton, et l'ambiance rétro réussie.
Il y a du challenge face à des ennemis coriaces pour le plus grand plaisirs des amateurs de FPS.
Bioshock Infinite est sans contexte un jeu à posseder d'urgence dans votre bibliothèque.
Si son prix vous rebute, attendez noël ! Ca sera un très beau cadeau !
One of this games that u must try!
Bioshock infinite is the best game I ever played 'nuff said

I've just finished Bioshock Infinite, to start with I've played both System Shocks, both Bioshocks, and now Infinite. I also played through Infinte on Hard difficulty.

The combat is fast and frantic, the powers are varied and have enough rock, sissor, paper mechanic to usually have a purpose. But you'll end up finding a play style that works for you and stick with it, but the game does a good job of having dip and troths, limitting ammo in areas to force you to adobt other methods.

Admitidly I got a bit distracted half way through my playthrough, and took a long break. It stuggled to keep me engaged during the 'gun shop' mission arc which I ended up moving on to other things.

Thats the only negative, and is reasonably personal. The positives are, an amazing art style. Quite simply the best companion AI I've ever seen (Dont look beyond the curtain, theres lots of tricks that make it work, but work it does), and a delightfully well orchastrated storyline. I would not stop short of calling this a masterpiece of interactive media, for It is. It's taken a lot of the story telling design theory of Half Life 2, and poslished, refined and tightened it to new heights.

Excellent world, quite good story, beautiful design, but very bad FPS.
This game shows promises since its very beginning. You discover a new weird world, that seems quite open and free. But soon, the game become a long, linear and boring FPS in which only the amount of ennemies and the size of their HP bars  are made to bring challenge.  The AI is one of the dumbest I've ever seen, and you only have to keep putting dozens of bullets in every ennemy.
This new universe would have make the game interesting (and to be honest, it is the only thing that made me keep playing) if it was well used. But what you have is only some voice records to make you understand the story (classic, and quite good way to learn, however). No break in the game, no time to stop killing, no time to look and think about what is happening.
The game is short, but it's okay for a FPS. Still, there is more than enough time to watch those poor bugged ennemies. In every gunfight, there are braindead guys standing in the middle of your sight and waiting to be killed. You don't even have to think, you can trick ennemies without trying. Bossfights are ridiculous, you can just stay at a good distance and kill everything without being annoyed.
So, Bioshock Infinite could have been a very good game, but it's actually crap. I can't understand why people love it.

Die Story nimmt einen von der ersten Sekunde an mit, die Einführung in die Welt, die Kräfte, die Charaktere, das Leveldesign - für alles gibt es eine in die Story eingebettete Erklärung. Begleiterin Liz wird einem nicht einfach an die Seite gebeamt, sondern entsprechend ihrem Charakter nach und nach dem Spieler nähergebracht.
Bioshock Infinite ist zu 100% ein Storyspiel. Man hat nie das Gefühl, im Grunde den gleichen Level zweimal zu spielen, und die Neugierde, wie es weitergeht, was als nächstes enthüllt wird, trieb mich über die Spielzeit an. Immer wieder wird der Spieler auf falsche Fährten geführt, glaubt, die Geschichte vorhersehen zu können, nur um festzustellen, dass doch alles ganz anders war/ist.....Klare Empfehlung!
